title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 301.1 - Administration of other social services programs by veteran assistance divisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 301.1 - Administration of other social services programs by veteran assistance divisions

State Regulations

Veteran assistance divisions or bureaus of social
services districts may administer the federally aided programs of assistance
and child welfare to veterans and their relatives who would be qualified to
receive veteran assistance, but only when the specified conditions required by
subdivision 5 of section
173
of the

Social Services Law and applicable rule have been met. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
301.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
